storyContext.summary: Track retrospective action items in a structured, versioned format, and surface overdue items prior to standup.

requirements.acceptanceCriteria: Track each action item with owner and due date.
Review previous action items at the start of the next retrospective.
Provide an automated way to surface overdue action items.

constraints.constraint: Use file-based tracking (no external systems required).
Schema must be simple enough to edit in PRs.
